phrases: The contract money Gaia transferred into our accounts,
the expected monthly salaries from the agency,
and estimated royalties we will be receiving from CD sales.
Our band is no longer some humble amateur band.
I figured I could easily support Hachi and her baby now.
Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, keep going on
Baby I am standing alone
An unforgettable rainy day
Chasing after your shadow
And it is over, it is like sand now
I sigh every night
I scream like a child and cried
It hangs there quietly, my sorrow
Please, please God, forgive my sins
I do not need to hide no more
Flowing toward the turquoise light
Just keep going on
You have got the chance now
You have got the power
Know you got to be so true to yourself
I show you my life now
I show you my love now
I show you my everything yeah yeah
You would better change now You would better catch now
Do not ever change so be yourself
I will show you my strength now
I will show you my love now
I will show you my everything yeah yeah
Baby do not be afraid

The walls in our dorm are really thin.

We played mahjongg till dawn
603 VACANT 602 NOBU (SPOILED KID) 601 MYU (STRUGGLING ACTRESS) 503 YURI (POPULAR PORN STAR) 502 NANA (QUEEN) 501 YASU (ILLEGAL LAWYER) 403 VACANT 402 VACANT 401 ME (PRETTY BOY) in the recreation room
(2F) COIN LAUNDRY RECREATION ROOM VENDING MACHINE (1F) PARKING ENTRANCE RECEPTION YAMAGISHI (RELEASED FROM PRISON) GINPEl (GAY) ELEVATOR in the recreation room on the second floor...
(2F) COIN LAUNDRY RECREATION ROOM VENDING MACHINE (1F) PARKING ENTRANCE RECEPTION YAMAGISHI (RELEASED FROM PRISON) GINPEl (GAY) ELEVATOR
Ron.
And we took Yuri to her room since
- she could no longer walk on her own.
- I am all right.
I am all right.
- Do not you touch her!
- Right.
Good night!
Let us do this again soon!
After listening closely to confirm that she was retiring to bed,
I got into bed myself.
Even if it were casual, if they end up doing it,
Nobu would get emotionally involved.
That is the kind of guy Nobu is.
Right now, I want him to think only of Hachi.
I still want him to love only Hachi.
But I want to stop saying such selfish things.
God... Buddha... Demon Lord...
Please make Nobuo and Hachiko get back together.
It is past eight.
You would better get up, or you will be late.
Sure...
Huh?
What about my alarm?
- It went off.
- Sorry!
Do you find it noisy every morning?
Or do you find me noisy?
Yeah.
Thanks to you, I have been able to sleep really well lately.
Was she being sarcastic?
Maybe.
You are alone on the fourth floor, are not you?
You are not planning to move here, are you?
Think why I fled from Room 603 after just one night.
Then what about the third floor?
Does anyone live there?
I have never seen anyone from there.
More importantly, what are you going to do today, Nobu?
Are you going to the fireworks festival?
Yeah.
You are going to get Hachi back!
Huh?
Well...
You coward.
Hey!
That is something I should decide after I see her!
If she seems happy, then that is good enough for me.
I do not want to get her back if it is going to interfere with her happiness.
But... if she seems sad, then I could not leave her like that.
No!
You seriously think you can just cancel your interview
at the last minute for personal reasons?!
I never said anything about canceling it!
I am just asking you to move it to another day!
Absolutely not!
Besides I cannot let you loose in a big crowd like that.
Do not worry about that.
Mika and Masaru said they would help, so our disguises will be perfect.
Oh my!
You think you can get away using
a professional hair stylist and makeup artist for your personal business?!
But when we called and asked,
they both found it amusing and were looking forward to it.
I wonder what kind of interesting outfits they have planned for us.
Regardless, I will not allow it!
All right.
If you will not allow it, I will just hafta skip work.
What did you say?!
I am so disappointed in you, Nana.
You have got a bad attitude, and you are a lousy singer,
but at least I valued you for your enthusiasm towards your work.
I am lousy?!
Well, that is why, Ginpei.
I wish you would understand that for Nana to be insisting so much,
this has got to be something really important to her.
Yasu... I understand.
For you to say so, it is got to be something really important.
What the hell?!
I will discuss it with the reporter.
He is really in love with him?
Oh, sure, that is fine.
We still have time before the proofing deadline.
Monday?
Not a problem at all.
KENICHI KANEDA (32) SINGLE MUSIC REPORTER
KENICHI KANEDA (32) SINGLE MUSIC REPORTER
Then I will try to finish this game and return to work before then.
What did he say?
He was extremely troubled by it,
but has agreed to somehow adjust his schedule to accommodate us.
All right!
I am sorry for the trouble, Ginpei.
- It is okay. - This is great!
Is not it, Nobu?!
I do have a heart, you know.
- That is good news, is not it, Nana? - Hey, come on!
Are not you happy?!
Y-Yeah...
Our band is becoming more and more like a family.
You cannot smoke!
- Ginpei's like the strong mama, - Why just me?
- Yasu's the dependable oldest son, - If you quit, Shin might quit too.
Nobu's the kind-hearted second son, and Shin's the bratty baby of the family.
It is because I am protected by this family
that I can get away with being so selfish and spoiled.
But then who is the dad?
If it is the president, that would make this some gangster family.
BLACK STONES CLAN
If it is the president, that would make this some gangster family.
BLACK STONES CLAN
I guess I will settle on the raccoon guy.
At least he is better than the fox guy.
That is not bad.
I have always wanted to be part of a big family like the ones on TV.
Now if Hachi would marry Nobu, it would be perfect.
OBSTETRICS GYNECOLOGY NAKAZATO CLINIC
OBSTETRICS GYNECOLOGY NAKAZATO CLINIC
You are now fourteen weeks along.
You are now fourteen weeks along.
The baby is growing well.
I have got a pretty good idea now on the gender of the baby.
Huh?
Would you like to know now?
Or would you like to keep it a surprise for when the baby's born?
I do want to know,
THUMP THUMP THUMP I do want to know,
THUMP THUMP THUMP but perhaps it would be more exciting to wait?
THUMP THUMP THUMP
THUMP THUMP THUMP
What should I do?
It is still an educated guess at this point.
Yes.
It is good that your morning sickness subsided fairly quickly,
but I am concerned about your rapid weight gain.
If you gain too much, it can be dangerous in many ways,
so try to focus on eating proper portions of nutritionally balanced foods, okay?
Actually, from an appearance point of view,
I do not want to gain weight, either.
I ate too much at lunch.
I will avoid the food stands at the fireworks festival.
Did you say something, Sachiko?
Huh?
You want a Jackson Burger?
No, no.
I have a bad feeling about that place.
Maybe I should not go to the fireworks festival, after all.
Well, I am sure it will be really crowded,
so your chances of seeing her are minimal.
But what if I run into her?
Myself aside, I would feel bad for Sachiko.
Her evening of fun would be ruined.
I think it would be worse not to take her for those reasons.
That is why I am in a bind!
It is been so long, Koichi Sato!
Nana...
My bad feelings have come true.
I have been led here by the Demon Lord.
If you had a revelation, then do not come!
But Sachiko said she was hungry.
A Jackson Burger and fresh orange juice.
Sure.
Sachiko?
The baby in my tummy.
Four months now.
Why did you name it that?!
- You are scaring me! - Do not ask me!
I did not want to name her that, either!
Then do not!
But my husband has his heart set on Sachiko.
By husband, you mean Takumi of Trapnest?
Jun-chan, you blabbermouth!
So it is!
No, it is okay.
I will not tell anyone.
I swear to the Demon Lord himself.
Sure, I promise.
I promise, so...
Can I get Reira's autograph?
You were a fan?
I thought I would display it in the alcove at my parents' place
and make it an heirloom.
I am sure my grandma would appreciate it and put her hands together every day.
Well, I guess so then.
I will ask for you, but Reira's really busy so I cannot promise anything.
You are friends with her?!
Well, sorta.
That is amazing, Nana!
Until recently, you were just a country girl.
I am going to call you a celebrity from now on.
Stop it.
I am just your average pregnant woman.
Okay, now you have got some attitude.
But seeing you now,
I guess running around doing as you wish is a great skill in a way.
These days, being firm and modest
is not enough to get you on the winning team.
I have learned something new.
Congratulations, celebrity!
Keep climbing that social ladder!
Hey, Take.
It looks like Ren's decided to marry Nana.
Huh?
Marry her?!
So you persuaded him, Takumi?
No, he brought up the subject himself.
And he does not seem to have any ulterior motives.
That is good.
- What are you talking about? -
That is the best.
He is out buying the ring right now.
We should arrange for him to meet her, so he can give it to her.
You are right.
With that ring, I am sure even Nana will accept it with joy.
We do not have to worry anymore.
You know, that is a really big diamond.
A worthless guy like me could never afford
to buy something like that in my lifetime.
I am happy for you, celebrity, that you did not settle with me.
You make it sound like I am some evil woman who dumped you.
SOMETHING IS NOT RIGHT
You make it sound like I am some evil woman who dumped you.
SOMETHING IS NOT RIGHT
But it is true!
You had me running in circles for you,
SOMETHING IS NOT RIGHT and then in the end, it is, I do not want him!
SOMETHING IS NOT RIGHT - Was I your toy? - You are the one who cheated on me!
- Was I your toy? - You are the one who cheated on me!
IT IS NOT RIGHT! - Was I your toy? - You are the one who cheated on me!
Sorry.
So you think that apologizing now will make it all right?!
I am sorry, but it is in the past, is not it?
I am surprised you can be so casual about it!
I am just trying to say what you want to hear.
You kept saying how much you loved me,
but it turned out that was all a lie!
I do not remember ever actually saying that to you.
I could hear it!
I know!
And there is no way that was a lie!
You know very well that I am horrible at lying.
That is why when I cheated on you, you found out right away,
and I confessed.
Right away?
While we are at it, tell me everything.
Why did you cheat on me?
I just gave in to temptation.
Maybe it was the Demon Lord.
But you were dating them both for a good two weeks.
Hey, Master!
If you are keeping track of your customers' criminal records,
you will get taken out someday.
Two weeks...
That is all?
What a boring man.
Celebrity!
You have changed my opinion of you.
You were keeping Ren's best interests in mind.
Huh?
Why, of course.
I think about his interests far more than you do.
I seriously worry about him, too!
But if he marries Nana and she stays with him forever,
it will cure his bad habits.
Oh, that is what you are talking about.
Huh?
It is okay.
He can quit whenever he wants to.
Ren just has no desire to.
You think so?
I think Ren wants to quit if he can.
Then he should quit.
But even you said you would quit smoking for the baby's sake,
yet you have not been able to!
Nicotine creates a chemical dependency in your body,
so quitting is not that easy.
But Ren's psychological dependency is also an addiction!
Keep your voice down.
If word gets out about him,
the band's activities will be suspended.
I am concerned about it too.
Do not get so worked up about it.
Be concerned for the sake of Ren himself.
Not the band.
That is not my role.
Is that why you are letting him get married?
He is a burden to you, so you want Nana to take on that role?
That is not it.
That is a different story.
Yes?
Ah, Mr. Narita.
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
Good afternoon.
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
How does it look?
I dyed it blonde.
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
At your age?!
That is ridiculous!
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
Reira, even if he does look ridiculous,
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT that is no way to talk to the president!
MITSURU NARITA (46) PRESIDENT
What brings you here today?
We will be meeting with the agency
- about Reira's commercial appearance.
- Sexual harassment!
We do not need you here!
Right, for the cosmetics.
That is great, Reira.
You will be aspired even more by
- young girls across the country.
- I only want to do jobs
that require singing!
Stop being selfish.
They will be using our song for the commercial.
Takumi, I heard about Ren.
The sooner we have a press conference, the better.
We should try and move things along quickly.
Bye!
BLAH
Takumi!
Why does even the president suddenly want
Ren and Nana to get married?
He is the one who suggested it in the first place!
He wanted Ren to announce to the press that he would protect Nana!
Why now?
He said he does not want Ren to look like he was being used by a woman.
His thoughts are that, by publicly declaring that they are lovers,
the public will be left with the impression
that BLAST became popular thanks to us.
That is ridiculous!
Well, he is not very smart.
Simply saying we are getting married
is more persuasive and leaves a favorable impression.
Then Narita will be satisfied, and we can put this silly party to rest.
So you want them to get married for your own protection?!
Actually, you disgust me!
What does the way you feel about me
have anything to do with Ren's problems?!
We are talking business here!
That is what I hate about you women!
Then I will point this out strictly from a business point of view.
The core of our fan base is young women.
With that in mind, I do not think having you and Ren getting married
one after the other is such a great plan.
If you seriously think all fans support us for our music only,
you are delusional.
I get it.
Then it would be better if just Ren got married, right?
Why is Sachiko working while you are wandering around?
We work different shifts.
You have got to work more so she can take it easy!
But we split the bills fifty-fifty.
That is one very reliable housewife.
I would say girls like you who not only spend a lot,
but rely on the earnings of others to pay for it are a lot less common.
I am glad you found a guy with deep pockets.
Hey, not that you would know it, but I have grown up a lot recently.
I know.
Jun-chan, you blabbermouth...
So Nana, who are you going to the fireworks with?
That is a secret!
We celebrities have many secrets that we cannot tell the commoners.
So even if we run into each other, do not talk to me, okay?
And I will do the same.
I really am sorry.
It is okay.
I had many faults too.
But thinking back, none of your selfish whims were that bad.
This might annoy you for me to say this,
but I still enjoy talking with you.
I am glad I could see you.
So I will not see you anymore.
Those with a record must refrain, you know.
Bye.
Get going!
You go first.
Where are you meeting?
It is a secret.
I still have time, so I think I will wander around a bit.
You sure like wandering, although you get lost easily.
I do not get lost anymore!
Hurry up and go!
Oh, by the way, when is she due?
Sachiko.
The end of April.
It is not possible that she will be late and arrive on May 5th, is it?
Why?
It is perfectly possible.
If she were born on that day, Children's Day,
it would be nice because everyone would remember it!
Are you sure it is not the Demon Lord's child?
I AM SURE SHE WILL BE BORN ON MAY 5TH...
Are you sure it is not the Demon Lord's child?
I AM SURE SHE WILL BE BORN ON MAY 5TH...
How dare you say something so ominous!
I AM SURE SHE WILL BE BORN ON MAY 5TH... AND SHE WILL HAVE 777 ETCHED ONTO HER HEAD!
How dare you say something so ominous!
I AM SURE SHE WILL BE BORN ON MAY 5TH... AND SHE WILL HAVE 777 ETCHED ONTO HER HEAD!
Children of the Demon Lord can only be born on July 7th.
I AM SURE SHE WILL BE BORN ON MAY 5TH... AND SHE WILL HAVE 777 ETCHED ONTO HER HEAD!
Let us hope so.
Well then, take care of yourself.
Give birth to a healthy human baby!
Hachiko's late, is not she?
No, it is only five thirty.
She does not have a key, so she will not be here until six of the clock.
What?
She does not have a key?
Yasu, you are too funny!
I cannot continue a conversation!
Mika and Masaru put all that effort into it,
so you should not be screwing around.
You are the one who put it on me.
You even paid for it.
With Yasu, placing wigs on him is so easy!
Shin, quit talking like Misato.
You are seriously cute like that.
That long hair looks surprisingly good on you.
I will bet Hachi will fall in love with you all over again.
But I do not want her to fall in love with me for that reason.
It makes you look a bit like Shoji.
Though you are shorter.
I thought so, too.
Petite Shoji?
Yeah, he does look like him.
Although Nobu's shorter.
Who is this Shoji?
And just how tall is he?
Shoji!
What is wrong?
Your eyes are red.
Huh?
My contact lenses are giving me problems.
But you have twenty-twenty vision.
Maybe I am just far-sighted.
The further away something is, the better I can see it.
But once it gets close, I lose sight of it.
That could be the same with everyone.
Let us hold hands all night tonight
so we do not lose each other in the crowd.
Especially since you are tiny.
Hey, Hachi...
They say you do not realize
how much you care for someone until after they are gone.
But I think it is when you come face to face with that person once more
that you truly recognize your feelings for them.
If I saw everyone again right now...
I know that I would depend on them just as much as I did back then.
I am scared of that.
That is why I cannot move from this spot.
A dark night lasting too long
Wakes up
It is too sad and painful
I gave up everything
But you loved me anyway
Kiss me and stay with me
A flower blooming forever
Light, fragile, strong
How could you smile for me
I need nothing else
Just stand by me forever
